items.translated_title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
items.content: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.

items.translated_title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
items.content: BMW is finally getting the next-generation Alexa voice assistant and it’s coming with a generative AI upgrade. Amazon said Monday that the 2026 BMW iX3 will be equipped with Alexa+, the same generative AI tech that launched in millions of the e-commerce giant’s smart devices last year. This will be the first vehicle to come […]

items.translated_title: Lucid Motors doubled EV output in 2025 after early Gravity SUV struggles
